contact.dialog.consent.title: Allow YallaXash to access to your contacts
contact.dialog.consent.first.part: It’s important that you understand what information YallaXash collects, uses and how you can control it. We explain it in details in our updated
contact.dialog.consent.second.part: and you can review the key points below.
contact.dialog.consent.why.question: Why does YallaXash use your data?
contact.dialog.consent.why.answer: YallaXash uses your data to improve your experience and improve our services.
contact.dialog.conset.some.examples: Some examples of data YallaXash collects and uses are:
contact.dialog.consent.first.example.con: With your permission to access your contacts we can upload selected contacts details to YallaXash servers to allow you to send money to contacts quickly.
